segments.text: Yes . I'm a transit passenger for this flight . Can you tell me where to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Oh , you're at the wrong gate . Your plane leaves from Gate No . 8 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I hope it hasn ’ t left without me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , don ’ t worry . Just follow me .
segments.speaker: S1
